name: Ubbi Steel Diaper Pail, Odor Locking, No Special Bag Required, Award-Winning, Registry Must-Have, White
short_description: POWDER-COATED STEEL: The Ubbi Diaper Pail is made of powder-coated steel, which provides superior odor control compared to other materials. This high-quality steel and rubber seal design ensures that unpleasant smells are contained within the pail, keeping your nursery smelling fresh and clean.

NO SPECIAL BAGS REQUIRED: Unlike other diaper disposal systems, the Ubbi Diaper Pail does not require any special bags, refills, cassettes, or inserts. Parents can use any standard trash bag which saves money and adds convenience.

SLIDING LID WITH CHILDPROOF LOCK: Equipped with a sliding lid, the Ubbi Diaper Pail minimizes air disruption when opened and closed. The pail’s innovative lid design ensures a smooth and airtight closure, trapping in stinky odors. The childproof lock keeps out tiny hands.

ALL STYLE, NO SMELL: Available in a variety of trendy and neutral colors, allowing parents to choose the perfect sleek design that complements any nursery décor aesthetic. This nursery must-have makes the perfect baby registry gift. No assembly required; ready to use straight out of the box.

MOST AWARD-WINNING DIAPER PAIL: The Ubbi diaper pail won NINE awards - proving parents and experts’ approval. Designed to be loaded, used, emptied and cleaned with ease. Our high-capacity pail holds up to 55 newborn sized diapers. Dimensions: 19.5” H x 8.4” W x 11.4” D. Wipe clean with a dry cloth.
product_description: The award-winning Ubbi Diaper Pail has earned worldwide recognition for its superior odor control and convenience, representing a breakthrough in the diaper disposal market. The Ubbi Steel Diaper Pail is crafted from powder-coated steel and provides maximum odor control. It’s rubber seals are strategically placed to lock in odors, and the innovative sliding lid minimizes air disruption, ensuring that unpleasant smells remain contained within the pail. The optional childproof lock keeps little hands out. Catering to the needs of modern parents, our baby diaper pail is compatible with any standard trash bags saving parents money and time. Strategically designed to be the easiest disposal system to load, use, empty, and clean. Enter the world of Ubbi where innovative products are designed and created with parents and children in mind. A wide range of Ubbi branded products is now available for today’s modern parents that are looking for stylish and functional baby essentials. Do not clean with any harsh abrasives or liquids - even water! Wipe clean with a dry cloth to prevent rust. No special bags needed. Dimensions: 19.5” H x 8.4” W x 11.4” D. Opening Size: 5 inches diameter. Holds up to 55 newborn sized diapers.

name: Cat Litter Scoop, Cat Litter Scooper with Holder for Litter Box Includes 10rolls (150pcs) Litter Bags, Large Shovel and Waste Storage Container, 3 in1 Portable Kitty Poop Disposal System (Blue)
short_description: 3-in-1 Cat Litter Scooper : This cat litter scoop is composed of an integrated litter scooper shovel, waste bin, and built-in cat litter bags storage box. Plus, this cat scooper for litter box contains extra 10 rolls (150pcs) trash bags of blue color!

One-Hand Operation Cat Litter Scooper : the neat bayonet connection between the cat poop scooper shovel sifter and the trash bin makes scooping and cleaning more easily. Just detach or fix the connection by pressing the button. Then we can scoop cat poops from litter box with one hand. And never forget to put the waste bag in the trash bin of the portable cat scooper before scooping.

Useful Cat Litter Scoop : For the 3 different size holes on the shovel, this kitty litter scooper can work with any kind of scoopable litter, clumping clay litter, crystal litter, or natural wheat and corn litter.

Saves You Time : The COMTENS cat litter scoop with bags is very lightweight and portable. With the cat litter scooper with holder you can save on time spent cleaning up after your furry friend at home and even when outdoors taking a walk.

Tips: This Kitty litter scoop is suitable for families with 1/2 cats or kittens. We recommend cleaning the litter box every 1-2 days. For very large clumps, you can use the edge of a spoon to cut the clumps in half before scooping.

name: Arm & Hammer Large Sifting Litter Box Scoop Free Cat Litter Tray with Microban, Made in USA
short_description: EASY CLEANING: Simplify your cat care routine with the sifting cat litter box's patented lift-to-sift technology. This provides efficient litter maintenance without scooping.
MAXIMUM ODOR CONTROL: As one of the best litter boxes for indoor cats, its built-in Microban protection inhibits odors from kitty litter.
MADE WITH RECYCLED MATERIALS: This sifting litter box for pine pellets is Made in the USA with recycled materials.
VERSATILE LITTER COMPATIBILITY: Our cat litter tray can utilize pine, crystal, pellets, and clumping cat litter. We suggest using Arm & Hammer SLIDE for optimal results with this cat litterbox.
COMFORTABLE SPACE FOR CATS: By following the guideline of being 1.5 times longer than your cat, and with its large cat litter box design, this product accommodates your feline friend's comfort needs.
product_description: Designed as a large litter box, it features advanced sifting technology that eliminates the need for a litter scoop. Simply lift the sifting box to separate clumps, keeping the cat litter box large and clean. The built-in Microban protection actively inhibits unpleasant odors. This jumbo litter box is made with recycled materials. It highlights Arm & Hammer's dedication to eco-friendly and sustainable pet supplies for cats. It accommodates various types of litter, including pellets for cat litter box, pine, crystal, and clumping varieties, with Arm & Hammer Slide being the preferred choice. Our high sided litter box is particularly suited for large cats, providing spacious comfort. As part of the Arm & Hammer range that includes pet supplies for cats like cat litter mats, cat litter & housebreaking, litter box with lid, cat boxes for indoor cats, kitty litter box, sifting litter boxes and more, this cat litter box offers a comprehensive suite of pet supplies for cats, including solutions for cat litter & housebreaking needs. With its easy clean litter box design, this xl cat litter box provides convenience and hygiene, making it a reliable choice for cat litter boxes for indoor cats. Invest in the Arm & Hammer Large Sifting Litter Box for a hassle-free experience, meeting all your kitty litter box needs.

name: GKJ Cat Litter Box Waste Disposal System for Odor Control Cat Litter Trash Can | Includes 1 roll of 16 Easy Tear-Off Bags | Diaper Trash Can
short_description: 10-Day Freedom: No more daily trash trips. Our 9L cat litter disposal holds 10 days of waste for one cat. GKJ cat trash can comes with a refill bag (lasts 4 months!), so you start saving immediately.
Stink-Proof Your Home: Triple-barrier defense actually works. 1. Airtight lid slams shut, 2. Inner flap blocks escape routes, 3. 7-layer eVOH bags molecularly trap odors. Smells stay sealed 24/7.

3-Step Magic of Litter Trash Can: Dump, Pull, Done. Scoop clumps → drop in → pull the handle of garbage disposal to lock. That’s it! No twisting, no tying, no messy fingers. Keep it simple, keep it clean.

See When It’s Full: The visible window lets you check waste levels at a glance—no more mess or odor build-up. Sleek design fits any room and cleans easily, perfect for cat litter, dog waste, or diapers.

Built to Last, Designed for Freshness: The 7-layer EVOH film blocks odors with a 40% thicker, premium-grade liner. Comes with 1 refill bag (16 pcs) for up to 4 months of freshness. Need more? Search “B0FGCPFLPR” or grab the bundle pack.

name: PETIZER Premium Cat Litter Scoop with 90 Count Refill Bags, Integrated Detachable Litter Shovel with Waste Container, Large Portable Cat Scooper with Holder, Kitty Poop Scooper & Easy Storage Caddy
short_description: ESAY TO USE — The PETIZER scooper makes it fast and easy to clean your litter box by only using one hand. When finished, just detach the scoop from the waste bin, tie the waste bag shut, and throw away.
SANITARY — All in one system keeps the mess contained. No more spilled litter. The bags are right there and you can scoop waste and then turn it upside down, the waste does not fall out.

AMAZING QUALITY — Scooper made of ABS+PP resin material, sturdy enough to scoop up even for big chunks. Perfect size holes (6MM), so the clean cat litter can go through. Only suitable for clumping cat litter.
VALUE BUNDLE — Come with 90 count refill bags (6 boxes of 15 bags)with lightly scented.

TIPS — PETIZER scooper is suitable for families with one or two cats or kittens. We recommend cleaning the litter box every 1-2 days. For very large clumps, you can use the edge of a spoon to cut the clumps in half before scooping.

short_description: ULTIMATE ODOR CONTROL: Litter Genie Easy Roll Pail and its sliding handle prevent odors from escaping. Together with our multi-layer refills with odor barrier technology they lock away odor from soiled cat litter.
EFFORTLESS CLEAN-UP: No more daily trips to the trash! The pail holds up to 8 days of cat litter (for one cat) so you can spend more time playing with your kitty and less time making trash trips.

LONG-LASTING, SUSTAINABLE: One refill cartridge lasts up to 6 months (for one cat). 80% less plastic used (1 Easy Roll refill cassette vs 3 square Litter Genie refill cassettes) and the pail is made from 99% post consumer recycled plastic and made in the USA.
EASY TO LOAD, EASY TO EMPTY: Our new Easy Roll Refill, included in the pail, comes with 24 bags that are perforated, on a roll. When the bag is full, the new one is right there.
SIMPLE TO USE: A fresher home in just 3 easy steps. Scoop clumps from the litter box, open the lid and drop the clumps, and pull the handle to lock away litter and odors.
INCLUDES: 2 Litter Genie Easy Roll refills (24 bags) for up to 12 months of supply (for one cat)

PET PARENT MUST HAVE: Litter Genie Pails and Refills are necessities for any cat, small dog or rabbit parent! Trust the Litter Genie brand for a fresher smelling home.

name: Red Rocket XL Cat Litter Trash Can Multi Kitty Twist’R Step Litter Disposal System Pack, 12x Refills Bags and 6X Charcoal Sachets, No Smell Litter Storage Container, Litter Disposal System
short_description: Ever have people tell you your house smells like cat, or not tell you, but they just stop visiting? Well, our team at Red Rocket has solved all of these pain points with the patented Litter TWIST’R, a dirty litter receptacle that DOES. NOT. SMELL. It is easy to use, AND looks good too!
【NO SMELL】: 1) Self-Sealing Bag isolates dirty litter. 2) Activated Charcoal absorbs odors. 3) 7-Layer Bag traps odor molecules. 4) Patented Twist Technology seals in odors.

【EASY TO USE】: Not only is it smell proof, but it is also easy to use: no kneeling, bending, cutting or tying required. Drop the dirty cat poop, twist the ball handle, and the poop and smells disappear. Forever! Full bag easily lifts out from the top or middle.
【HIGH CAPACITY BAG】: Each bag holds up to 17 pounds (almost 8 kg) of litter. Just a pennies a day. You NEVER have to kneel down and cut and knot a tube or film again.
【QUALITY GUARANTEE】: If you aren't completely satisfied with your purchase, please let us know and we'll make it right.

name: Self Cleaning Litter Box, Automatic Cat Litter Box with APP Control, Smart Safety Sensors for Multiple Cats, Odor-Free Waste Disposal with Cat Litter Tracker, Includes 1 Trash Bags
short_description: Effortless Automated Cleaning & Spacious Entry: Experience hassle-free cleaning with this fully automatic litter box that intelligently separates and stores waste in a sealed, odor-proof compartment. Its sleek white design blends seamlessly with modern home decor, while the oversized entry ensures comfortable access for cats up to 18 lbs.

Smart Safety Protection: This advanced system features built-in weight sensors that record each cat's weight. The device instantly detects your pet's presence and automatically pauses cleaning cycles. Designed for cats weighing 2.2 to 18 lbs, its multi-layer protection provides reliable security for multi-cat households.

Real-Time Monitoring with APP Control: Track your cat's bathroom habits and litter usage through the dedicated mobile app. The built-in health monitor records frequency and duration of visits. Compatible with 2.4G WiFi, the app sends timely notifications when the waste container needs emptying.

Quiet & Odor Control: Operates at just 40dB for a peaceful home environment. Infused with plant-based essential oils including cedarwood and sage, it effectively neutralizes odors without harmful chemicals, perfect for busy households or travelers seeking reliable, low-maintenance cleanliness.

Litter-Compatible Operation: The unique butterfly-shaped filter works with all clumping litter types, effectively sifting through waste while preventing internal buildup. The smart self-cleaning system maintains a fresh, sanitary environment after each use, keeping your pet content and your home odor-free.

short_description: 100% Hands-Free Step & Drop Convenience: Award-winning, hands-free functionality parents love—just step on the pedal, drop in the diaper, and you're done. No bending, no twisting, no squishing—just simple, mess-free diaper disposal.

Durable, Easy-to-Clean Construction: Crafted from high-quality 70% GRS CERTIFIED RECYCLED closed-cell ABS plastic that’s built to last and won’t absorb odors. Unlike metal pails that can rust, this surface can be safely cleaned and sanitized with common household cleaners.

Ready to Use with Pre-Installed Refill: Arrives fully assembled with a full-sized Dekor Classic eco-friendly refill already inside - holds up to 495 newborn diapers. Smart, Cost-Saving Refill System: Empty the pail as often as you want without wasting a full trash bag. The continuous liner system lets you cut and tie off exactly what you need—saving time, mess and money.

Versatile Use Beyond Diaper Duty: Designed to grow with your family—once your diapering days are over, simply remove the trap door insert and use it as a sleek, hands-free trash can for bathrooms, laundry rooms, or pet waste.
